Player History
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off LaMarr Hoyt (SD)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/18/1985, off Shane Rawley (PHI)...
Injured on 4/2/1986 with a Fractured Hip, out for 4 weeks...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $521,429 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $634,286 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/1988, hitting .500 with 0 HR, 4 RBI...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,078,571 through salary arbitration...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1989...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/8/1990 to a 5-year deal worth $6,100,000 per year...
Injured on 9/30/1991 with a Broken Wrist, out for 10 weeks...
Released by Toronto on 10/14/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/7/1992 to a 3-year deal worth $2,550,000 per year...
